channel.title: Posts on Paarth Neekhara
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Paarth Neekhara

item.title: The Important Things In Life Are Often Simple
item.description: I remember these words from a lecture on Theory of Computation. The more you complicate a solution, the more specific it becomes to the problem being solved. The less you assume, the more you generalize. I’ll keep this article specific to Machine Learning and how simple things can do wonders! Language There is something magical about how a little child learns a language. The child is not imparted any knowledge related to the semantics or the grammar of the language.

item.title: My journeys in the Himalyas
item.description: As I step into a new chapter of life, I recollect my fondest of memories in the Himalyas. It is hard to recall when I first discovered my love for the mountains. Maybe it was my first trek in the school days when I felt very proud about completing. Or it was when I had my first camera and wanted to visit places that would make __ pictures. I dont know, but I am sure anyone who has experieced the hills would find it hard to not fall in love with them.
